description:
Hurt And Can No Longer Work? We Can Help.

If you suffered an illness or injury that prevents you from working, you are likely scared and stressed about how you will support yourself and your family. Luckily, for those living in and around Port Charlotte, Florida, help is available.

Avard Law Offices, P.A., focuses primarily on helping disabled workers obtain the compensation and benefits they deserve. Established in 1989 by experienced disability attorney Carol Avard, the law firm has helped thousands of clients throughout Southwestern Florida secure the finances they need in the wake of a debilitating injury or devastating loss.

Unmatched Legal Counsel And Service

With two attorneys on staff certified in Social Security Disability by the National Board of Trial Advocacy, the law firm offers comprehensive, effective support to its clients with their initial filings as well as help appealing their denied claims.

In addition, the firm also has on staff legal professionals fluent in Spanish, French, Russian and Ukrainian. This means they can provide the personalized assistance you deserve in your native tongue, reducing the issues associated with language barriers and better helping you achieve the goals you seek.

For All Your Injury-Related Legal Needs

In addition to handling all areas of SSDI, the attorneys at the law firm also advocate strongly on behalf of disabled veterans and those who suffered an injury or lost a loved one because of an act of negligence or wrongdoing. From motor vehicle accidents to medical malpractice and nursing home abuse, the firm's lawyers have years of experience protecting the rights and entitlements of those they have served and helping them recover the maximum amount possible for their losses and pain and suffering.

To discuss your specific needs free of charge, you can contact Avard Law Offices, P.A., to schedule a no-obligation consultation.
